name: app-1752717357460
description:
Purpose: Create a Landing page for an automated personalised career advisor, called Pookie, helping users discover ideal study and job opportunities in weeks instead of years.  The logo is a friendly monkey mascot logo. Make the website's colour palette the following: - **Dominant Pink/Rose**: A warm, dusty rose or mauve pink (`#C4869C` approximately) used as the primary background color
- **Deep Burgundy/Wine**: Darker red-pink accent (`#8B3A5C` approximately) used for buttons and the main brand logo.
 Make the text human readable. For example if the background is white use black text.

Sections  
✅ Hero Section  
  
Headline: Discover Your Best-Fit Career – Faster  
  
Subheadline: Find your ideal study and job opportunities in weeks, not years.  
  
CTA Button: Get Early Access  
  
Illustration: AI or compass guiding a student/professional.  
  
✅ How It Works  
  
Step 1: Take quick tests assessing interests, personality, skills, work values, and work styles.  
  
Step 2: Get matched instantly to suitable jobs and industries based on real benchmarks.  
  
Step 3: Explore personalised study and career pathways.  
  
✅ Why Choose Us  
  
Personalised recommendations based on your data  
  
Reduce years of trial and error to weeks  
  
Benchmarked against actual job and industry requirements  
  
✅ CTA Section  
  
Headline: Start Discovering Your Path Today  
  
Subheadline: Sign up for early access.  
  
CTA Button: Get Early Access  
  
✅ Footer  
  
Links: Privacy Policy, Contact  
   
Subtle fade-in animations  
  
Outcome: A clear, attractive landing page that explains what the platform does, how it works, and drives users to sign up for early access.
